mapper.select: SELECT a.task_id, a.week_task_id, a.order_task_id, a.title, a.gmt_create, a.gmt_modified, b.task_item_id, b.task_id, b.title, b.time_length, b.video_info_id, b.video_url, b.wiki_id, b.gmt_create, b.gmt_modified FROM task a JOIN task_item b ON a.task_id=b.task_id WHERE a.task_id=#{taskId}
